content: प्रधृष् {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To assail, lay hands on. {@--2@} To injure, harass. {@--3@} To overpower overcome. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To assail, attack; overpower. {@--2@} To outrage, violate (a woman). {@--3@} To injure, hurt. {@--4@} To devastate, lay waste, destroy completely.
